discourse_list.title: Closing in on 10B, who sould get the NFT?

content.content: The 10 billionth DAI seems to be imminent and to that occasion Makerburn will celebrate by minting a new commemorative NFT.  Just auctioning this NFT off like the previous ones feels kinda boring, however. I’m therefore interested to hear what the MakerDAO community thinks is a good way to decide who gets the treasure. Maybe a 10B DAI related meme competition where the winner is decided by forum vote? Maybe whoever manually burns the largest amount of their MKR tokens within some specific period of time gets the token? Maybe just a random pick? Personally, I like the meme competition  Please let me know your most fun suggestion!
I honestly believe the meme competition is the best way to do it
Fractionalize the NFT, and airdrop it to all dai holders that had at least 1 dai at the 10B mark
So a fungible non-fungible?  I think distributing tokens to some hundreds of thousands of addresses is a bit above my gas budget…
it can be claimable by users in stead of send  But indeed, perhaps not the best idea.

Not sure I would drop it to DAI holders (cost and number here), but to actual DAI minters (vault owners with outstanding balances).   Have it as a possible claim awarded to vault owners as of 10B mark since these people are the ones paying the DAI interest and backing the DAI with their hard earned collateral. I really think CUs, delegates and MKR holders should get a shot as well since this was accomplished based on many people. Alternatively if only so many will be minted perhaps all of these parties get a NFT lottery ticket and the available NFTs are lotteried off.
Just to be clear, I only plan on minting one NFT, and I want someone here in the community to have it.

Ohhhh…   1 Just doesn’t seem right. You know might be better to spread these a bit and doing a 10B Maker celebration NFT on Gnosis Chain (formerly xDAI) and distribute as the cost there would be minimal.   SNAFU is working on a interface to bridge these NFTs to various networks including Ethereum should people want… Just an idea to spread the celebratory 10B NFT farther.

Why not using this to drive users to Discord for example? All the ones who wants the NFTs have to go to the Discord and follow XXX steps, then they get the NFT, opportunities like this one only appears once in a while, so could be a nice idea to drive ppl inn. (doesn’t have to be Discord  specifically, but you get my point hehe)

If it’s just for one NFT, then my vote is for a meme competition! It’s a tried and true way to engage and grow the community while generating great content.     Lozadaluis12:  Why not using this to drive users to Discord for example? All the ones who wants the NFTs have to go to the Discord and follow XXX steps   To expand on this example, meme submissions would go through Discord to drive growth. Users must join and submit their entries to a temporary meme-submission channel. It could be voted by reactions, a panel of judges, or another way. Also, a supplemental idea to reward multiple users is to give out POAPs. These could be claimable for a limited time to Discord members. Alternatively, as @MakerMan suggested, we could specifically distribute to DAI minters using something like POAP Delivery that whitelists addresses. So POAPs for the whole community and an NFT grand prize for the best meme!

Fortnite tournament!  I doubt that is the best game to pick, but you might be able to choose some game that is semi inclusive and would allow us to compete for the prize! Maybe something productive would be nice. Potentially a hackathon and the best entry gets the NFT.
